verses.esv:
22   He who finds a wife finds a good thing
    and obtains favor from the LORD.
verses.kjv: 22 Whoso findeth a wife findeth a good thing, and obtaineth favour of the LORD.
verses.niv: 22 He who finds a wife finds what is good and receives favor from the LORD.

verses.esv: 21 And because the midwives feared God, he gave them families.
verses.kjv: 21 And it came to pass, because the midwives feared God, that he made them houses.
verses.niv: 21 And because the midwives feared God, he gave them families of their own.
